publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4432 Ms Maureen Watt: Local Food is Miles Better—That the Parliament notes that the tonnage of food air freighted around the world has risen by 140% since 1992 and that, although air transport only accounts for 1% of food miles, 11% of food miles’ carbon dioxide emissions are down to air transport; further notes that there has been a 23% rise in food transported by HGV since 1978 and that the average distance travelled has increased by 50%, and supports Farmers Weekly’s Local Food Is Miles Better campaign, which aims to cut food miles and pollution and to support local food producers.

S2M-4432 Local Food is Miles Better (lodged on 22 May 2006) Rob Gibson*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Jim Mather*, Murray Tosh*, Brian Adam*, Alex Johnstone*, Mr Andrew Arbuckle*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Patrick Harvie*, Alex Fergusson*, Fergus Ewing*, Mike Rumbles*

S2M-4432 Local Food is Miles Better (lodged on 22 May 2006) Roseanna Cunningham*, Eleanor Scott*, Mr John Swinney*, Nora Radcliffe*, Michael Matheson*, Chris Ballance*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Robin Harper*, Bruce Crawford*

S2M-4432 Ms Maureen Watt: Local Food is Miles Better—That the Parliament notes that the tonnage of food air freighted around the world has risen by 140% since 1992 and that, although air transport only accounts for 1% of food miles, 11% of food miles’ carbon dioxide emissions are down to air transport; further notes that there has been a 23% rise in food transported by HGV since 1978 and that the average distance travelled has increased by 50%, and supports Farmers Weekly’s Local Food Is Miles Better campaign, which aims to cut food miles and pollution and to support local food producers. Supported by: Rob Gibson, Mr Jamie Stone, Jim Mather, Murray Tosh, Brian Adam, Alex Johnstone, Mr Andrew Arbuckle, Mr Adam Ingram, Patrick Harvie, Alex Fergusson, Fergus Ewing, Mike Rumbles, Roseanna Cunningham, Eleanor Scott, Mr John Swinney, Nora Radcliffe, Michael Matheson, Chris Ballance, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Robin Harper, Bruce Crawford, Mark Ballard*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4432 Local Food is Miles Better (lodged on 22 May 2006) Linda Fabiani*, Dr Jean Turner*, Christine Grahame*, Fiona Hyslop*, Frances Curran*
S2M-4432 Local Food is Miles Better (lodged on 22 May 2006) Rosie Kane*
S2M-4432 Local Food is Miles Better (lodged on 22 May 2006) Mr Mark Ruskell*
S2M-4432 Local Food is Miles Better (lodged on 22 May 2006) Shiona Baird* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
S2M-4432 Local Food is Miles Better (lodged on 22 May 2006) Richard Lochhead*, Cathy Peattie*
